title: Life Without Crows
description: "Wonderful collection." --Dean Wesley Smith; "You'll be hearing a lot more from Gerri Leen." --Mike Resnick. Life Without Crows, the new collection by Gerri Leen. Journey to faraway places, go back to the beginning, travel to the future...sink into two dozen stories that range from dark to light, fantasy to everyday, short-shorts to novelettes.
author: Gerri Leen
